comment.author: 69502719@N07
comment._content: This photo is unlikely to be before 1881, when the LNWR was opened to Blaenau North-Western Station. The line was opened to the tunnel mouth at the foot of Llechwedd incline in 1879.

comment.author: 93521529@N07
comment._content: And with a Ruabon wagon there, is it before 1883; when the more direct GWR line opened to Blaenau?
